description: NodeRuntimeHandler is a set of runtime handler information.

features.description: NodeRuntimeHandlerFeatures is a set of features implemented by the runtime handler.

recursiveReadOnlyMounts.description: RecursiveReadOnlyMounts is set to true if the runtime handler supports RecursiveReadOnlyMounts.

userNamespaces.description: UserNamespaces is set to true if the runtime handler supports UserNamespaces, including for volumes.

name.description: Runtime handler name. Empty for the default runtime handler.
